channel.title: CRAN on The R Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CRAN on The R Blog

item.title: Windows/UTF-8 Toolchain and CRAN Package Checks
item.description: A new, experimental, build of R for Windows is available, its main aim being to support the UTF-8 encoding and especially non-European languages. Check results for CRAN packages are now available on their CRAN results pages. Please help by reviewing these for your package(s) and if a Windows user by trying the new build, particularly if you use a language written in a non-Latin script. The new build can be downloaded from [2] and instructions are at [1].
